dataset_id: NACP MsTMIP: Global 0.5-degree Model Outputs in Standard Format, Version 1.0
title: NACP MsTMIP: Global 0.5-degree Model Outputs in Standard Format, Version 1.0
summary: This data set provides global gridded estimates of carbon, energy, and hydrologic fluxes between the land and atmosphere from 15 Terrestrial Biosphere Models (TBMs) in a standard format. Model estimates are at monthly and yearly time steps for the period 1900 to 2010, with a spatial resolution of 0.5 degree x 0.5 degree globally, excluding Antarctica.

cmr.title: NACP MsTMIP: Global 0.5-degree Model Outputs in Standard Format, Version 1.0

Model estimates are at monthly and yearly time steps for the period 1900 to 2010, with a spatial resolution of 0.5 degree x 0.5 degree globally, excluding Antarctica.
cmr.description: This data set provides global gridded estimates of carbon, energy, and hydrologic fluxes between the land and atmosphere from 15 Terrestrial Biosphere Models (TBMs) in a standard format. Model estimates are at monthly and yearly time steps for the period 1900 to 2010, with a spatial resolution of 0.5 degree x 0.5 degree globally, excluding Antarctica.
